vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, only mentioned at 1Ch.2.51;
son of: Hur (H2354);
brother of: Uri (H0221), Shobal (H7732H), Salma (H8007H), Jezreel (H3157J), Ishma (H3457), Idbash (H3031), Hazzelelponi (H6753), Penuel (H6439H) and Ezer (H5829)
§ Hareph = "a plucking off"
a son of Caleb and father of Bethgader
vocabInfos._es_Definition: descendiente de Caleb; tribu de Judá; fundador de Bet-gader
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
哈勒 这个專有陽性名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "摘下"
迦勒的子孫, 也是伯迦得之祖 (代上 2:51)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
哈勒 这个专有阳性名词在希伯来文的意思是 "摘下"
迦勒的子孙, 也是伯迦得之祖 (代上 2:51)
